thread.section_title: Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: FernandaCS72
title: Perfect location
text: The hotel is located near Angel Station and in a short distance from Islington - a nice area for a Sunday morning walk. The room was clean and very quiet. The double bed was small - next time, I will ask for a room with two single beds instead. The pillows were too thin which caused a bit of neck pain.The staff was not rude, but could be a friendlier. We didn't have breakfast at the hotel as we decided to have it at the food markets. I would definitely stay there again.
